properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 9 at 3:41PM HST until February 10 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO
6 PM HST MONDAY...

.A brief period of snow and freezing rain is expected later
tonight and Monday which may accumulate on roads and structures.

* WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of
1 to 3 inches and ice accumulations of one tenth to two tenths
of an inch.

* WHERE...Haleakala Summit and Big Island Summits.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM HST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan for slippery road conditions. Blowing snow will
significantly reduce visibility at times.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet, or
freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Be prepared for
slippery roads and limited visibilities and use caution while
driving.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM HST MONDAY
